EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-10-24 Maximize Cloud Discounts in AWS & Azure - Live Demo.ES-20181022-I
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Invitation | Maximize Cloud Spend in AWS & Azure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]>
Register Now to Enter to Win - $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You are invited to join us this Wednesday, October 24th at 11 a.m. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]>, as our team demonstrates how to leverage AI-powered decisions to maximize performance in the cloud at the lowest cost. Register now to enter to win a $100 Amazon card.
Reserve Your Seat <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]>
In this 30-minute demonstration <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]>, you will learn how Turbonomic understands of your entire stack - from the application down to the hardware - to automatically generate a migration assessment that enables IT teams to deliver the best AWS or Azure configuration at the right cost.
See you there! Megan
PS. If you can't make it live, sign up anyways <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]> and I'll send you the recording afterward.
